name: Brightness Slider
author: xzs
description: Hides the brightness slider from the aggregate menu

name: Location Options
author: xzs
description: Hides the location options from the aggregate menu

name: User Switch
author: xzs
description: Hides the switch user sub menu from the aggregated menu, removing the logout option. Handy for a single-user system

name: Volume Controls
author: xzs
description: Hides the volume controls from the aggregate menu. The volume can still be adjusted via hardware keys

name: Bluetooth Indicator
author: brad
description: Hides the bluetooth indicator from the aggregate menu
